Package org.jruyi.io

JRuyi IO Package Version 2.5

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CharArrayCodec.ICharArrayCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a char array codec provider has to implement.
    CharCodec.ICharCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a char codec provider has to implement.
    CharSequenceCodec.ICharSequenceCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a char sequence codec provider has to implement.
    Codec.ICodecProvider
    ICodec provider.
    DoubleArrayCodec.IDoubleArrayCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a double array codec provider has to implement.
    DoubleCodec.IDoubleCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a double codec provider has to implement.
    FloatArrayCodec.IFloatArrayCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a float array codec provider has to implement.
    FloatCodec.IFloatCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a float codec provider has to implement.
    IBuffer
    A byte buffer, which contains a linear, finite sequence of bytes and has the following properties: size, position and mark.
    IBufferFactory
    Service for creating buffers.
    ICharCodec
    A char codec used to encode/decode char value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    ICodec<T>
    A codec used to encode/decode data to/from a chain of buffer units.
    IDoubleCodec
    A double codec used to encode/decode double value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    IFilter<I,O>
    A filter is in charge of splitting the incoming data into messages, and performs filtering tasks on both incoming and outgoing messages.
    IFilterOutput
    An output holder for a filter to pass the output to the next filter as an input.
    IFloatCodec
    A float codec used to encode/decode float value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetCharDecoder
    Decodes a char from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetDoubleDecoder
    Decodes a double from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetFloatDecoder
    Decodes a float from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetIntDecoder
    Decodes an int from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetLimitedDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetLongDecoder
    Decodes a long from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetShortDecoder
    Decodes a short from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetToDstDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IGetToRangedDstDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IIntCodec
    An int codec used to encode/decode int value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    ILongCodec
    A long codec used to encode/decode long value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    IntArrayCodec.IIntArrayCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that an int array codec provider has to implement.
    IntCodec.IIntCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that an int codec provider has to implement.
    IPrependCharEncoder
    Encodes a char to a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependDoubleEncoder
    Encodes a double to a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependEncoder<T>
    Encodes data into a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependFloatEncoder
    Encodes a float to a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependIntEncoder
    Encodes an int to a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependLongEncoder
    Encodes a long to a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependRangedEncoder<T>
    Encodes data into a chain of buffer units.
    IPrependShortEncoder
    Encodes a short to a chain of buffer units.
    IReadCharDecoder
    Decodes a char from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadDoubleDecoder
    Decodes a double from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadFloatDecoder
    Decodes a float from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadIntDecoder
    Decodes an int from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadLimitedDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadLongDecoder
    Decodes a long from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadShortDecoder
    Decodes a short from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadToDstDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    IReadToRangedDstDecoder<T>
    Decodes data from a chain of buffer units.
    ISession
    A session represents a context of a connection.
    ISessionListener<I,O>
    This interface defines callback methods for being called on session events.
    ISessionService<I,O>
    This interface defines all the methods that an IO session service need implement.
    ISetCharEncoder
    Encodes a char to a chain of buffer units.
    ISetDoubleEncoder
    Encodes a double to a chain of buffer units.
    ISetEncoder<T>
    Encodes data into a chain of buffer units.
    ISetFloatEncoder
    Encodes a float to a chain of buffer units.
    ISetIntEncoder
    Encodes an int to a chain of buffer units.
    ISetLongEncoder
    Encodes a long to a chain of buffer units.
    ISetRangedEncoder<T>
    Encodes data into a chain of buffer units.
    ISetShortEncoder
    Encodes a short to a chain of buffer units.
    IShortCodec
    A short codec used to encode/decode short value to/from a chain of buffer units.
    ISslContextParameters
    Service for providing parameters needed to initialize an SSLContext.
    IUnit
    A buffer unit, which contains a linear, finite sequence of bytes and has the following 4 properties: start, size, position and mark.
    IUnitChain
    A chain of buffer units.
    IWriteCharEncoder
    Encodes a char to a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteDoubleEncoder
    Encodes a double to a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteEncoder<T>
    Encodes data into a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteFloatEncoder
    Encodes a float to a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteIntEncoder
    Encodes an int to a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteLongEncoder
    Encodes a long to a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteRangedEncoder<T>
    Encodes data into a chain of buffer units.
    IWriteShortEncoder
    Encodes a short to a chain of buffer units.
    LongArrayCodec.ILongArrayCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a long array codec provider has to implement.
    LongCodec.ILongCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a long codec provider has to implement.
    ShortArrayCodec.IShortArrayCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a short array codec provider has to implement.
    ShortCodec.IShortCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a short codec provider has to implement.
    StringCodec.IStringCodecProvider
    This interface defines all the methods that a string codec provider has to implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCodec<T>
    A default ICodec implementation with all methods throwing UnsupportedOperationException.
    CharArrayCodec
    This class is a factory class for char array codecs.
    CharCodec
    This class is a factory class for char codecs.
    CharSequenceCodec
    This class is a factory class for char sequence codecs.
    Codec
    This class provides several useful ICodecs.
    DoubleArrayCodec
    This class is a factory class for double array codecs.
    DoubleCodec
    This class is a factory class for double codecs.
    Filter<I,O>
    This abstract class provides pass-through implementation of IFilter.
    FloatArrayCodec
    This class is a factory class for float array codecs.
    FloatCodec
    This class is a factory class for float codecs.
    IntArrayCodec
    This class is a factory class for int array codecs.
    IntCodec
    This class is a factory class for int codecs.
    IoConstants
    Defines standard names for IO constants.
    LongArrayCodec
    This class is a factory class for long array codecs.
    LongCodec
    This class is a factory class for long codecs.
    SessionListener<I,O>
    A default ISessionListener implementation with all methods doing nothing.
    ShortArrayCodec
    This class is a factory class for short array codecs.
    ShortCodec
    This class is a factory class for short codecs.
    StringCodec
    This class is a factory class for string codecs.
